entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:31 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 07:31 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:31 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
